name: Slo' Mo' Fighters
description:
You have a sword and the ability to control time.

Use your sword to eliminate all the enemies that stand in your way.

As you play the Slo' Mo' ability will randomly spawn across the floor, collect it, and whenever you want, press right click to enable it, you'll have 5 seconds of slow down where you can kill all your enemies.

In order to dash use the combination of W,A,S,D and SPACEBAR, the player will dash in the direction that he is moving.

SONG : System Shock by neocrey, you can find it on the unity's asset store for free along other 11 amazing tracks

Have fun.
